title: Design Thinking Pedagogy for Creative Education: Escape Game Simulation-Based Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of educational methodologies and introductory knowledge of design thinking
context.additional_context: Creative teaching method development applicable to language education for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test) by applying them to an escape game simulation
Learners can analyze team members' roles in collaborative problem-solving processes and employ effective communication strategies in VR environments
Learners can integrate escape game design principles into language education scenarios to create innovative instructional designs
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
